item.title: How do i make shops?
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

Adding a shop

  1. Spawn a npc that have trade option

I will take this one for my server .

spawn = 520	2910	3614	0	0	0	0	0	1	admin shop

Ok i will save and close Autospawn.cfg

Now im gonna go in shops.cfg and add a new line.

shop = 45	Admin Shop					2	2	642	100	652	100	662	100	640	100	650	100	660	100	638	100	648	100	658	100	2589	100	7611	100	1107	100	1077	100	1949	100	2904	100	4827	100	3103	100	2740	100	2741	100	1051	100	1053	100	1054	100	1055	100	1056	100	1057	100	1058	100	467	100000	6583	10	2422	10	1037	10	1038	10	1040	10	1044	10	1046	10	1048	10	1435	10	6585	10	6745	1	1419	10	13665	10

Explain code : If your last line is shop = 50 add a new one named shop = 51 the one that i chose there is an example !

Admin Shop ( The name of the shop )

We are at the part where are 2 of 2 .

The first 2 is the buy/sell option - If is 1 You can sell items , If is 2 you can only buy items.

And the second 2 i dont know what is with him there…

Now you will see

642 100	 652	 100	 662	 100	 640	 100 ...... more ids and ammounts

642/652/662/640 are the item ids
and 100 is the ammount

Now you do the shop you spawn the npc but there is one more thing , to make shop to work.

Open Client.java and search for Wanneshop

And you should see something like

if(NPCID == 2536){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; }

If you see somthing like that add this under it

if(NPCID == 520){ // Admin shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 45; }

Explain code :
NPCID is the npc id that you seletecd for shop.
//Admin shop - that have nothing to do with code i just put it to remeber what shop is that.
Wanneshop = 45 Is the Shop Line that you added in Shops.cfg

Replace them / save / compile / run .

That’s all.

Read full topic
